patthana21.45:4.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.45:4.2: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.45:4.3: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana21.45:5.1: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
patthana21.45:6.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
patthana21.45:7.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighassa purimasadisaṃ navapañhaṃ kātabbaṃ.
patthana21.45:8.1: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
